text: halli ama'n kumsoomriat leimili katung chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom,2:37. Halli ama'n kumsoomriat leimili katung chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom, emakli kumsoomriat leimili chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom.  halli ama'n biak-inn kha leimathaan lekleiya suunli zaan Pathian chubei thoa bu ngeiya Pathian niya aleiom.
